column1: '''''Land of the Dead''''' is a song by the [[Tolkien metal]] band [[Summoning]]. It appears in their sixth full-length album
==Lyrics==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">
Where forest stream went through the wood
And silent all the stens there stood
Of tall trees
With mottled shadows on their bark
As faint as deepest sleeper's breath
An echo came as cold as death
Long are the paths
Where no foot's print is ever laid
No moon is there
Of beating heart; a sigh profound
Once in each age as each age dies
Alone is heard. Far
The Land of Waiting where the Dead sit
In their thought's shadow
Upon the plain
Shadows at dead end of night and mirrored in the sky
Far far away beyond might of day
And there lay the land of the dead of mortal cold decay
</poem>
{{title}}
